content.prompt: The construction of canals depicted on the map most directly led to which of the following?

choices.label: The growth of plantation agriculture in the lower South
A strengthening of economic ties between the Northeast and the Midwest
Greater movement of goods between the South and the Northeast
Increased conflict between the United States and American Indians on the Great Plains

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
